hmh.android.ui.actionbar

Class ActionBarHelperICS

  • java.lang.Object
    • hmh.android.ui.actionbar.ActionBarHelper
      • hmh.android.ui.actionbar.ActionBarHelperHoneycomb
        • hmh.android.ui.actionbar.ActionBarHelperICS

  • public class ActionBarHelperICS
extends ActionBarHelperHoneycomb
    An extension of com.example.android.actionbarcompat.ActionBarHelper that provides Android 4.0-specific functionality for IceCreamSandwich devices. It thus requires API level 14.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class hmh.android.ui.actionbar.ActionBarHelper

      protected Context getActionBarThemedContext()
      Returns a Context suitable for inflating layouts for the action bar.

    • Method Detail

      • getActionBarThemedContext

        protected Context getActionBarThemedContext()
        Description copied from class: ActionBarHelperHoneycomb
        Returns a Context suitable for inflating layouts for the action bar. The implementation for this method in ActionBarHelperICS asks the action bar for a themed context.
        Overrides:
        getActionBarThemedContext in class ActionBarHelperHoneycomb
